channel.title: Talk to npc and he give you anything
channel.description:
i want to make a thing like if you talk to santa he wil give you a santa hat :P hou can i do this?
and is this posible to do this only once
and if it is posible i want to make anything lik if you talk to hans and you give him a phat than he gives you a haloween mask
and is this posible to do this only once
if anyone can help my out realy THNX

item.title: Talk to npc and he give you anything
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

} else if (NPCID == 0) { if (playerHasItem(1043)) { deleteItem(1043, 1); addItem(1056, 1); sendMessage("You trade Hans a Partyhat for a Halloween Mask"); } }

That?

Read full topic

he means go into client.java and search for case 155 and you should see something like
